content: i m having fun making modifications to the original better dorm boots slippers /patterns/library/better-dorm-boots-slippers pattern this one i call deluxe because they are super warm and comfy - they take a wee bit more time because of the fold over cuff but are so worth it i made the blue ones in one color but you could change it up and make the cuff and sole a different color than the foot area more to come like my kriskrafter 1 page on facebook for updates to new patterns 1 https //www facebook com/kriskrafter/
